title: Blue Ridge Parkway: Passport Stamps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go     Passport Stamps              Passport Stamp Locations       The Blue Ridge Parkway site-specific Passport Cancellation Stamp locations. This listing begins at the northern end of the Parkway at Milepost 0 in Virginia, and runs to the southern end at Milepost 469 in North Carolina.  Humpback Rocks Visitor Center (MP 6)  Stamps available for Humpback Rocks and the Appalachian Trail James River Visitor Center (MP 63): 1 stamp Peaks of Otter (MP 86): 1 stamp Rocky Knob Visitor Center (MP 169): 2 stamps Mabry Mill Cultural Site (MP 176): 1 stamp Blue Ridge Music Center (MP 213): 1 stamp Moses Cone Memorial Park Visitor Center (MP 294): 1 stamp Linn Cove Viaduct Visitor Center (MP 304): 1 stamp Linville Falls Visitor Center (MP 316): 1 stamp Minerals Museum (MP 331) Stamps available for the Minerals Museum and for the Overmountain Trail  Craggy Gardens (MP 364): 1 stamp Folk Art Center (MP 382): 1 stamp Asheville Blue Ridge Parkway Visitor Center (MP 384) Stamps available for the visitor center, for Graveyard Fields, and for the Blue Ridge Heritage Regional Office Waterrock Knob Visitor Center (MP 451): 1 stamp Oconaluftee Visitor Center, Great Smoky Mountains National Park (MP 469); 1 stamp. Exit the Parkway and turn right onto US-441 towards Great Smoky Mountains National Park. After approximately 1 mile, turn right at the Oconaluftee Visitor Center.
